name: ThemeSpec

aliases.name: ThemeSpecColor
aliases.type: { bg : Color.Color, fg : Color.Color, aux : Color.Color }

aliases.name: ThemeSpecColorVars
aliases.type: { bg : String.String, bgChannels : String.String, fg : String.String, fgChannels : String.String, aux : String.String, auxChannels : String.String }

aliases.name: ThemeSpecData
aliases.type: { fonts : { title : String.String, text : String.String, code : String.String }, colors : { base : ThemeSpec.ThemeSpecColor, primary : ThemeSpec.ThemeSpecColor, secondary : ThemeSpec.ThemeSpecColor, success : ThemeSpec.ThemeSpecColor, warning : ThemeSpec.ThemeSpecColor, danger : ThemeSpec.ThemeSpecColor } }

values.name: fonts
values.type: { title : String.String, text : String.String, code : String.String }
